column4: hmm, we having a discussion on Vmware? funny, i have a question regarding installing that, lol
actually all i want to install is the VMWare tools

anyways, my quick question, is i have the CD mounted, and one of the files is a "rpm" file, from what vmware's tools say you should just be able to double click the file, but when i do that it opens up the archive thingy
ubuntu is .deb based not .rpm, you'll need to install alien to install rpms
